channel.title: Dementhium adding Donator Sign next to name?
channel.description: Hello i actually try to add the signs next to name for donator, i have 3 donator statuses and i got 3 images for them packed on cache only client dont response on that so player name in chat when he talks the sign does not appear . I need it to appear on chat like Admin or Mod crowns . Can some one help me with this i will rep you and will be very thankful! Thanks already.
